About Reading

Books I've read in 2017

31 Dec 2017

Continuing with the tradition of posting the list of books I’ve read on the current year here is the list of books I’ve read in 2017:

  • Eclesiastes – Rei Salomão
  • Arábia: A Incrível História De Um Brasileiro no Oriente Médio – Raiam dos Santos
  • Os mitos do dinheiro: o caminho para a sua independência financeira – Gabriel Torres
  • Learn Python the Hard Way– Zed Shaw
  • Imigrante Ilegal – Raiam dos Santos
  • The New Kingmakers: How Developers Conquered the World – Stephen O’Grady

Hope you enjoyed the list and wait for more books next year.
